cs.ualberta.ca.medlog.helper

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs.ualberta.ca.medlog.helper.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object

    Description:
    The purpose of this class is to interact with the ElasticSearchController to store and retrieve data to be used within the application.

    Issues:
    None.

    References:
    Android Developer Guide, Determine and monitor the connectivity status https://developer.android.com/training/monitoring-device-state/connectivity-monitoring#java Last updated 2018-05-08, accessed 2018-11-09

    See Also:
    Cache

      • cacheLoad

        public <T> T cacheLoad(java.lang.Class<T> type)
                throws UserNotFoundException
        Calls for the database's cache to load a class from its data.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type parameters.
        Parameters:
        type - The class of the object to be returned.
        Returns:
        The object loaded from the cache.
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - Thrown if the user can't be loaded.

      • loadPatient

        public Patient loadPatient(java.lang.String username)
                    throws UserNotFoundException,
                           java.net.ConnectException
        Retrieves a patient from the online database if a connection can be established, otherwise loads the patient from disc.
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the patient to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        The patient object tied to the username.
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - Thrown if the patient cannot be found.
        java.net.ConnectException - Thrown if local loading fails and a connection to the database fails.

      • loadProvider

        public CareProvider loadProvider(java.lang.String username)
                          throws UserNotFoundException,
                                 java.net.ConnectException
        Retrieves the care provider from the online database if a connection can be established, otherwise loads the provider from disc.
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the provider to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        The care provider object tied to the username.
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - Thrown if the provider cannot be found.
        java.net.ConnectException - Thrown if local loading fails and a connection to the database fails.

      • savePhoto

        public java.lang.String savePhoto(Photo photo)
                           throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                  java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                  java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Saves the given photo to the elastic search database.
        Parameters:
        photo - The photo to be saved.
        Returns:
        The id of the photo.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the photo doesn't have a file path.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Thrown if the saving is interrupted.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Thrown if the saving cannot be done at the time.

                                      Photo photo)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Loads a given patients photo onto the devices disk.
        Parameters:
        username - The patients username.
        photo - The photo to be loaded.
        Returns:
        The path of the photo on the device.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if the photo could not be loaded.

        Returns:

      • searchPatient

        public java.util.ArrayList<SearchResult> searchPatient(java.lang.String username,
                                                       java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> keywords,
                                                       MapLocation map,
                                                       BodyLocation bl)
                                                throws UserNotFoundException,
                                                       java.net.ConnectException
        Search through patient problems and see if it matches any keywords.
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the patient to search.
        keywords - The keywords we are looking for. Can be null.
        map - The map location we are looking for. Can be null.
        bl - The body location we are looking for. Can be null.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of search results that match our search.
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - Thrown if the patient can't be found.
        java.net.ConnectException - Thrown if the patient can't be found locally and can't be loaded.

      • searchPatient

        public java.util.ArrayList<SearchResult> searchPatient(Patient patient,
                                                       java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> keywords,
                                                       MapLocation map,
                                                       BodyLocation bl)
        Search through patient problems and see if it matches any keywords.
        Parameters:
        patient - The patient to search through.
        keywords - The keywords we are looking for. Can be null.
        map - The map location we are looking for. Can be null.
        bl - The body location we are looking for. Can be null.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of search results that match our search.

      • searchCareProvider

        public java.util.ArrayList<SearchResult> searchCareProvider(java.lang.String username,
                                                            java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> keywords,
                                                            MapLocation map,
                                                            BodyLocation bl)
                                                     throws UserNotFoundException,
                                                            java.net.ConnectException
        Search all care provider patients for all keywords, map, or body location.
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the care provider.
        keywords - The keywords, can be null.
        map - The Map location, can be null.
        bl - The body location, can be null.
        Returns:
        A list of search results that match all of the keywords, map, or body location.
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - Thrown if the provider can't be found.
        java.net.ConnectException - Thrown if the provider can't be found locally and can't be loaded.

      • searchCareProvider

        public java.util.ArrayList<SearchResult> searchCareProvider(CareProvider careProvider,
                                                            java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> keywords,
                                                            MapLocation map,
                                                            BodyLocation bl)
        Search all care provider patients for all keywords, map, or body location.
        Parameters:
        careProvider - The care provider to search for
        keywords - The keywords, can be null.
        map - The Map location, can be null.
        bl - The body location, can be null.
        Returns:
        A list of search results that match all of the keywords, map, or body location.

      • checkConnectivity

        public boolean checkConnectivity()
        Checks if a connection to the elastic search database is possible.
        Returns:
        Boolean of whether the connection can be established.
